Please consult README.md for general info. For more information consult the
individual text files in the documentation directory.

AUTHORS.txt   - Who wrote the software
CHANGELOG.txt - Dates and descriptions of changes
FAQ.txt       - "Frequently" Asked Questions
INSTALL.txt   - How to install the software
LICENSE.txt   - The license under which the software is granted
NEWS.txt      - Project announcements/news
THANKS.txt    - Thanks to contributors, users
TODO.txt      - List of future changes to consider for the project
